website_summaries.verdict: The easy switch between personal use or batch blending makes this machine particularly versatile.
pros: A powerful, 1200-watt blender that allows you to switch from personal servings to large 64-ounce batches with one machine
Also comes with to-go lids to make meal prepping even easier
cons: Hard to prove that "extraction" method of blending is more nutritious

customer_reviews.title: Much Improved Model
customer_reviews.text: This is my third NB purchase and by far the most impressive product. The first two were 600 and 900 watts, which lasted about 3 years each when the motors burned out. I assume this was because of filling too close to the lines. This model has several improvements, including multiple speeds and functions, an actual blender, plus the 32 and 24 oz cups for smoothies; it is quieter and more high tech. The old style cup had rubber gaskets that were inset and fouled if not very carefully cleaned by removing them. The new cups have eliminated this problem. I expect to enjoy this NB more and for it to last longer than my first two.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Smoke Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I loved my new Nutribullet, I use it everyday! I am on a strict diet and protein shakes are my daily meals, this thing was great until today. It started smoking, and something broke! I’ve only had it for 4 months... I’m so disappointed, I will try to reach Nutribullet directly and see what kind of warranty it has. I love in California and as of yesterday we are on mandatory quarantine due to COVID-19 so this couldn’t happened at a worse time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very loud! I didn't think noise would ever be an issue but this is WAY louder than any blender I’ve owned in the past. The base is also very heavy and suctions to surfaces, so not ideal if you are constantly getting out/putting away (I personally do not like appliances sitting out on the counter when not in use). The smaller sized cups are so tall with just a tiny blade at the bottom, I can never get it to blend my ingredients - so basically they are useless. Sadly will be throwing this away and getting something else ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Smoothies and Veggie Drinks!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, we are impressed with this as daily smoothie and juice drinkers. Easy to use, wash and operate. A more quiet blender than we expected, great accessories and crushes ice very well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MA MAC

customer_reviews.title: Smoothie lover
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I need it for my family smoothies! Everybody loves the smooth texture, no more chunks in our drinks!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Fraind

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Nutri product.
customer_reviews.text: Tried a few Nutri blender products. This one worked the best for me. Didn't leak like the others (lids had to be on just right, which was hard to tell if it was to prevent leaking). Love the multiple uses. The only thing I wish was that it had a smaller cup.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Monstrously loud and ultimately wasteful
customer_reviews.text: I used this for making smoothies. However, it's hideously loud and I can barely stand the noise long enough to process.... Even worse, the small containers that come with the blender have a separate blade attachment that's a disaster; the last time I used a mini-container it stuck fast to the blade attachment after I used it. I was NOT ABLE TO DETACH IT nor was anyone in my household. I threw the container (still attached to the blade attachment) into recycling. Huge waste of effort and a major frustration. Also, large container is designed with large divots, for some reason, that make it difficult to clean (as is the top).
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good blender. But....
customer_reviews.text: The consistency of blended item is superb, comes out smooth and nice. Needed this to make some black eyed bean purée and it was just perfect. I gave a 4 star because oh yes the blender is super noisy, and I’m still speculative about the genuineness of the product. The ones sold in stores comes in a blue box while this comes in a brown box(don’t know why). On the blue box and nitro bullet website one of the smoothie cups comes with a handle while this one doesn’t. If I can get clarity on these issues then I can give this a 5star. Overall it’s a powerful blender.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It definitely does the job but it is INSANELY LOUD!! I do not know how something so pricey couldn't be much more quiet. My husband and I have to shout at each other over the blending. Husband edit: Don't mind my wife. The blender is perfect and much better than any other ones I've used at that price point. As a powerlifter, I use the blender a lot (at least twice a day) to get in extra calories. It's been able to handle whatever I throw it it. Very impressed. Yes. It is loud. Guess what it's a blender lol.
customer_reviews.author: Wilsons

customer_reviews.title: Boost your energy ! Stay fit for a well worth It, price value and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Blends well all the fruits vegetables. I did a test you can see picture above no need for using collard for to drain IT IS ALL LIQUIFY. The extract works perfection. Pour into the to go cup and let’s started this day feeling glorious! Green smoothie or juice. Stay healthy pays off.
customer_reviews.author: Maristela G Abreu

customer_reviews.title: Going, going, gone....
customer_reviews.text: This blender started out great! The extract button, worked well with breaking down ice cubes, frozen fruits and vegetables. After about week, Smoothies were taking longer and longer to blend. Then I had to defrost the fruits and vegetables before blending. As time went on, ice wasn’t breaking down so I switched to water, juice or milk to help the blending. Then I had to keep my hands affixed to the container because the container was unlocking from the base. Now, it’s just a big expensive blender sitting on my counter that I dread using. So, I’m returning it. I’m really disappointed because it was working so well.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Product broke after a few months of slight use. The product started smoking and nearly went into flames. Not safe. Called Amazon who were helpful, they put me through to NutriBullet who were terrible customer service. 20 mins questioning on how we were using it, to the point they asked what we put in our smoothies. Insane. I was told the product was out of stock, that they would send replacement in 3 weeks. Never got an email after the call, never heard anything. 7 weeks later still heard nothing, nothing sent. I have been trying to call them since and no help at all. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing purchase! The extract button makes it easy to perfectly blend every time, and the blender does all the work for you. I love that you can attach the smaller cups as well as the large container. This blender has great power and is easy to clean and use. Would recommend. I used to use the small blenders such as the small cup ninja or nutribullet but this blender is a total game changer.
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Our previous blender was okay, but could not manage almonds well though we wanted to make a smoothy with almonds, fruits, and yogurt. We were thinking between the much costlier vitamix 5200 and this one and decided to try this based on good Consumer Reports rating and great Amazon reviews. We are glad we took that decision. Works very well so far. Almonds were pasted very well in the smoothie. Can manage other things like vegetables and fruits very well.
customer_reviews.author: Garden_Lover

customer_reviews.title: Gets used everyday
customer_reviews.text: This appliance quickly became invaluable in our kitchen! We use it every day to make healthy shakes and smoothies, also to make pureed soups, hot chocolate, and sauces. So far, we have not had any leakage issues that we read about in the reviews. Personally, I think one trick is that the threads of the jar and the base must get critically cleaned with soap and a dish sponge and dried with a towel. It is tempting to just rinse it out and toss it on the dish drainer, but then residue and minerals from the tap can build up over time and eventually affect the seal between the jar and base.
customer_reviews.author: xev

customer_reviews.title: Make Great Smoothies and More at Home
customer_reviews.text: This machine is very powerful. It is able to macerate even frozen fruit. For smoothies I found that starting on high, then switching to extract works well. I put kale in my smoothies for greater nutrition, and you can't even detect the kale except for it sometimes turning the smoothie greenish in color. It's super intuitive to use. Also, it cleans up very easily...just rinse after use and you're all set. Stays put on the counter, but can be easily moved around for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Alice Haywood

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender love it!
customer_reviews.text: I order a refurbish vitamix and a special Blender cup from Amazon for a total of like 350 dollars.... after i received it and used ot for like a week i really liked it but no matter what ii just could not justify 350 dollars on a blender. So i returned it and order this Nutribullet combo. For the money inghink it was the best move! So far i have blended salsas, soup mix (tomatoes,onion,garlic with chicken broth) and when it done its perfectly blended that i don’t have to use a strainer. Milkshakes, smoothies i mean i done everything except my own peanut butter. And it works as good as the Vitamix for a way lower Price! Totally recomended!
customer_reviews.author: Boltman

customer_reviews.title: 120V not 230V
customer_reviews.text: Probably not a bad product, wish that Amazon would have stated that it is 120V. I live in South Africa and we use 230V, thus rendering this appliance pretty useless. Now i have to purchase a converter which will allow me to use this appliance. This is not is much Nutribullet's fault but more Amazons bad technical info. This is so annoying!!
customer_reviews.author: Riaan Joubert

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and easy to clean. I am pleased with my purchase. The blender is easy to use. It is easy to clean. It has multiple functions (Make sure you read the instructions, even if you've used a blender before. It helps). I have had this blender for a while now and I have no had a problem with rust or grime in small areas. You just have to make sure to clean it after each use (this includes drying it). The blade is very sharp, so be careful. The blade cuts froze vegetables and fruits up with no problem. I will update my review in the future if need be. For now though, I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and now a smoky mess
customer_reviews.text: Luckily this device burned up 2 weeks before the warranty expired. Now I will see if the company has integrity.
customer_reviews.author: R. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Leaking Oil into Smoothies!!!
customer_reviews.text: For the first 6 months of using this blender for smoothies it worked great. The extract setting is very effective. My only complaint is that around the 6 month mark the blades started leaking some kind of oil into the smoothies we were making. Ever since then we have not been able to use the product. An expensive replacement to only last 6 months!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hardesty

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Let me first off saying I use to previously use a ninja that was my roommates and Never seemed to have any issues with. Once we parted ways I decided it was time to purchase my own blender. I went with this one because it seemed to have good reviews and for it’s ability to blend up nuts. To my surprise this thing barely blends up the fruit in my smoothies, leaving me with chunks I end up having to chew throughout my morning. It is also extremely loud. Which wouldn’t be that big of a deal if it actually blended my smoothie all the way through. Regardless I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jaylyn

customer_reviews.title: Hot smell and smoking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January. It is now May. I used it about 4-5 times a week. This week I smelled a "hot" smell while I was using the Bullet portion. When I turned it off, it was lightly smoking.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: The Blade smoked after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender about 9 month ago, it was fine for about 6 months, but started to smoke and made loud noise after 6 months. I called the customer service and they told me I have to change the blade every 6 month which including the shipping will cost me about $30 every 6 month just to maintain the device. Under warranty they gave me one time blade but I had to pay for the shipping, or extend the warranty. If I knew I had to pay $30 for blade every 6 month I wouldn't buy this blender. They did not mention about this in their website or amazon. Not cool!
customer_reviews.author: Mehdi  Kazemzadeh

customer_reviews.title: Does not blend
customer_reviews.text: This blender does not blend anything well. Bananas for my smoothie, dates into my chocolate, roasted red peppers for my sauce. Does not blend any of this!!! Do not buy this product. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Kenner

customer_reviews.title: Mangled, beat up box arrived as stated.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived just as stated; however, the box was crushed and taped at the shipping center because the address label was under the tap on the box. Product is in new condition and works as described, but it was a gift and the presentation was poor due to the mangled box it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Made the wrong decision to purchase this NutriBullet product.
customer_reviews.text: Model NBC-12A NutriBullet. Two weeks old and failed with pieces of gray plastic shooting out from under the unit as identified in pics. Motor was also smoking as plastic pieces were shooting out. Purchased through Amazon...date shipped 8/14/20 ...dated arrived 8/16/20 and registered on the same day. Used 5 times to make green veggie kale smoothies and then it failed. Called Customer Care...they took info and assured me a technical specialist assistant would give me a call back soon. The unit is in warrantee for 30 days for a full refund.....but you have to pack in original box and more. Box is gone. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: peter souza

customer_reviews.title: Best ever and believe me I’ve tried them all!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased some of the most expensive blenders, and this one is the best!! Very easy to clean, the smaller one that mixes up a shake is awesome, the lid screws into it not over the top as all of them do. The base is solid and secure and has a lot of power!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie J Beach-Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy / Died After 4 months - just past the warranty
customer_reviews.text: This blender is very powerful and blends great - however, after using it once a day for Protein Smoothies with fruit, veggies and sometimes already crushed ice or frozen fruit - it burned out. Amazon has gratefully refunded the money. $130 for a blender that crashes after 4 months is ridiculous. I know I was much easier on this than others would be. No whole fruits or anything harder than frozen berries or crushed ice - and that was only a few times. Also, my husband hated this blender because it is so loud.
customer_reviews.author: Dana G

customer_reviews.title: Broke in Six months
customer_reviews.text: I only had the unit for six months and the adapter for the smoothie sized carafe began to smoke and ball bearings went flying everywhere. I want to order a replacement part but cannot find one. So disappointed in this company
customer_reviews.author: GDY

customer_reviews.title: Build in blade
customer_reviews.text: So far I really love it. I put my frozen fruit and all other good stuff in it, and use the awesome to go cuppa. So far it works great. One thing though, the blade is build in, and a bit difficult to clean. So, you can not take it apart as w other blenders. But, the seal is tight, blade super strong and I love my cups to go.
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I'm slightly disappointed with is that you're not supposed to run it longer than a minute. I wish it would just automatically turn off after a minute like my old one so I didn't have to stand there and watch it.
customer_reviews.author: seniorRVers

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I had the smaller version of the NutriNinja in the smallest size. I would make a recipe called the Ninja 9 and it would come out decent but a little thick. You could use a spoon. It was also unforgiving if I did not chop the fruits to small pieces. None of that here. It blends well. The exact same recipe comes out fully liquified. I wish I had gone for something this size and power from the onset. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd D.

customer_reviews.title: If you don't like noisy--maybe not for you.
customer_reviews.text: I don't really mind the noise, in fact, most mornings I enjoy it because it wakes me up. To me, (so far) that's really the only complaint I have (and again, it doesn't bother me). I bought this back in December, and most weeks.. I use it every single day, and its still working like the first day I bought it. I only use it for smoothies. Frozen, and not frozen fruits. Its small, so its easy to store if you're one of those people who don't like leaving alliances out. Overall, for my first blender ever-- I'm not mad.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: It awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender!!! So much more power than the Ninja that I got rid of because of the problems it was giving me. I wish I had bought this Nutribullet 2 years ago instead of the Ninja. This Nutribullet is made with much better quality overall
customer_reviews.author: john darryl howard

customer_reviews.title: Smokes from blade base
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom. She loved using it. Except just after a year of use, one day smoke started coming off of the base through the blade along with the burning smell. I am kinda bummed because return eligibility and product support window closed. I spent so much money on it thinking a good quality item like this would last longer. Unfortunately, that is not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Jannatun Nayem

customer_reviews.title: Noisy as hell
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, including almond milk, tick smoothies and fresh ice cream. The extra jars are useful. But it’s noisy as hell. Unbearable. The noise stresses the guts out of everybody around, cat and dog included. I will be replacing this with another brand and model, even at two or three times the cost, if I find something less noisy. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Milton Bradman

customer_reviews.title: Better than a JUICER!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a juicer. It flaked and stopped working and was a MESS to clean. The juice receptacle was small and useless. This NUTRIBULLET blender is the TRUTH!!!. Chops any solid veggie or fruit to a liquid. Ensure you add some form of JUICE or fruit liquid to it because it eases the blending process. The smaller "to-go" cups make it easy to bring a smoothie for breakfast or lunch or post-workout shake at the gym. I have not tried it with any chilled or frozen fruit yet but i imagine you have to let it thaw some before blending. I love this blender and definitely believe it was WORTH the investment. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender! It's just what I needed and I love the option of using a blending cup OR the full blender. I mainly use the blender for smoothies and so far I haven't had any issues. It's powerful enough to blend with ease, even with tougher ingredients. I also like the suction cups on the bottom of the blender. It lightly suctions to the counter so you don't feel you have to hold the blender down. One thing to note - the blender is pretty loud. That being said, I think most blenders are loud... so do with that what you will.
customer_reviews.author: Emily W

customer_reviews.title: Switched from Vitamix
customer_reviews.text: Switched to bullet after my second Vitamix died. Nice blender for The Price. Like the travel cups. not as powerful as the Vitamix but voting power is enough to blend the raw nuts frozen fruit and ice in my protein smoothies. Easy to clean. Nice large container. A bit loud but only slightly more so then the Vitamix. Very happy with this especially at not spending hundreds of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Nu

customer_reviews.title: Great blender, but loud!
customer_reviews.text: Great blender, the power is great. Quality of smoothies and ice creams is the best honestly, however the only reason I gave it a 4 stars out of 5 is because it’s SUPER loud. Wow, I’m sure our neighbors know when we’re making shakes, other than that zero complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: High quality, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We use this blender almost every morning for our smoothies! It blends wonderfully. Love the suction cup feet so you don’t have to worry about it when blending at full speed. I love the individual cup blender option if you want your own smaller portion as well. Would highly recommend to anyone wanting high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: BROKE AFTER 5 USES
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of junk. All I was using it for was making protein smoothies, guess a little bit of cut up frozen fruit is too much for this $100+ blender to handle. Cleaned it after every use (which was surprisingly cumbersome). DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Very happy i purchased
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this blender. The blending power is truly impressive. I love having the smaller bullet option for smoothies as well. Overall very happy and excited to keep using!
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha Gold

customer_reviews.title: Power bottom broken in the first month
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunally after 3 weeks of regular use of this unit the high speed bottom stopped working. I contacted Nutribullet customer service and they don’t have replacements parts for this units. I am waiting for the replacement almost 2 months and now all the bottoms stopped working : ( TOday I reached back customer service and replacements units are unavailable yet :( they asked me to wait other 3 weeks otherwise I will request a refund. So please be aware!!
customer_reviews.author: Ponciano Herrera

customer_reviews.title: My shakes will never be the same
customer_reviews.text: I can not say how much I love this blender! Just got it yesterday but it’s a game changer. I do shakes with chia seeds and my previous blender didn’t cut into the seeds but this one is so different I couldn’t even feel the seeds in my shakes. Everything’s as chopped up and blended perfectly. Easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Great for green drinks
customer_reviews.text: I like my smaller nutri-bullet that has been heavily used for years, but love this larger capacity. For green drinks, just add your food/liquid, press 'extract' and it automatically purees it to the perfect consistency and shuts off when done. Suction cups beneath work well. To clean, add water and blend for a few seconds. It's as loud as most blenders, because it is a blender. Nice quality, overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not that good!
customer_reviews.text: This is just after 6 months of use. The product as such is really good, but after 6 months of use it actually becomes useless since there is lot of rust that comes out and then you have to buy another cap/replacement part for 20 bucks...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best part of Breakfast
customer_reviews.text: We love our NutriBullet Blender Combo. I use it every morning for my breakfast smoothie and my friend uses it every night for an ice cream shake! It's three different size attachments with accompanying lids are perfect for on the go or just to store whatever you've blender in the fridge for later!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Baroni

customer_reviews.title: 3 months and the blades for the cup are leaking.
customer_reviews.text: This blender does pretty good at blending, although I was expecting it to be a little better. you have to add quite a bit of liquid for it to blend easily, so making thick smoothies are a struggle. After only owning it for 3 months the blades that go with the cups are now leaking...not terribly yet but I know it is only a matter of time before it is no longer useable.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia R Burch

customer_reviews.title: After 8 months mine started smoking!
customer_reviews.text: I got this blender in November 2019. Now it is May 2020. Today my machine started smoking I quickly unplugged it. Then I read about these machines smoking and exploding! Fortunately mine didn't explode. I am not going to replace it. I always follow the guidelines for using it. I'm saving up for a vitamix.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT at a GREAT price!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this juicer! I was concerned with the price, but I think it's as good as the expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Cweb

customer_reviews.title: This Nutribullet does EVERYTHING
customer_reviews.text: I had an older Nutribullet in which I've had for years. It eventually started acting up on me and I was gonna just get the same one. BUT ran across this Nutribullet which has different functionalities!! Blender and all. I love it! Works perfectly for my juicing, blending and all
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey White

customer_reviews.title: Completely useless within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Large blender disconnects from the base unit when I turn it on, causing the unit to spin and blender to not actually blend at all. I am forced to shake it like a mad man for a half hour just to get the thread to connect occasionally to blend anything. This issue has occurred since day 1. Then 6 months into using the product the smaller blender has begun smoking and smelling terrible. I am forced to throw this POS away after just 6 months. Very disappointed. I would not recommend ANY Nutri-BS given the lack of QA testing that clearly went into this product. Just terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful! I use it almost every day. The first couple times I used it it smelled like it was burning up but now it doesn't do that. I love the fact that I have the ability to use the single serve cups and the 8 cup blender for parties!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Whitmire

customer_reviews.title: Good power and great blending
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look the moment it came out the box. Yes, the base is heavier than usually ordinary blenders but it comes it’s stick on buttons on the button so it remain firm on your countertop. It blends amazingly and the power is amazingly great. it is a bit loud but not much more than regular blenders . I love the size of the cups. They are 32 oz blender and 24 oz cups. Large enough for plenty of smoothies . Can’t wait to try my different recipes on both .
customer_reviews.author: Ana Dianka Arriaga

customer_reviews.title: Takes too much for it to work
customer_reviews.text: I just got the blender today... It came in an opened box because, it wasn't secured properly with packing tape. Then, I decided to try it out on a smoothie, I literally had to shake the whole blender to get it to work. It was literally just sitting the ingredients in the center because, the individual cup blender is TOO FLAT to cut anything in the center if you dont move the blender physically. Once I moved it around... it worked fine. Also, extremely loud but, that's kind of whatever. I tried the large blender and it's too big to reach a smaller serving because, the blades push everything to the unreachable edges.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: Motor blew and I only had this for 7 months. I only usee it to make my smoothies and I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: rosalinda diego

customer_reviews.title: A little power house
customer_reviews.text: This a great blender. I have another high end blender that's lasted years, but the wife needed it at her work out of state so I found this for a fraction of the price. My wife likes it so much she wants to trade me blenders. 😆
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product so far
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender. I’ve had it for a couple of months and use it almost every morning. The smoothies are great! It’s easy to clean and has a smaller profile and looks sexier than comparable blenders, which is a big plus if you have a smaller kitchen and plan to keep it on your countertop.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Good at First
customer_reviews.text: Originally I wanted to write a positive review, I had nothing but good things to say. My wife and have been using this blender since the end of December, that's just over 6 months now started out daily use and we clean it after every use. Here it is June I turn it on this morning to hear an awful noise, decided to clean out the bottom of the extractor just in case something had been missed, tried it again sounded even worse this time it seemed to bind up a second then go again,I take the cup off to find bearings and metal shavings. I have to say I'm not happy our original magic bullet lasted longer than this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even last a year! Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender on October 27, 2019. For me, personally, a blender should work for at least two-three years before requiring replacement and this one didn’t even last a year. Every time that I use it, my kitchen smells like smoke and I can hear the poor machine grinding away. It’s a shame because I have been a loyal nutribullet customer (I’ve owned more than three) but I guess that I’ll need to start researching new brands because the longevitity of this machine is just not good enough for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jessica Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Good machine. Not so good 2nd blade.
customer_reviews.text: A love the nutribullet. I don't know if this amazing power and utility is what caused the cup blade rings or whatever to fail. When I use it, what is inside the cup spills under the blades and makes a mess. I need to get another blade this one is no good.
customer_reviews.author: I. Stout

customer_reviews.title: This is a good one
customer_reviews.text: The easiest one I've had in years. small footprint. easy to clean. use for your daughter to make her own smoothies in the cup. I love it. Great buy for the money. I can't see why you would spend more money.
customer_reviews.author: Dee W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Blends perfectly every time!
customer_reviews.text: Best blender for the money. I had a ninja before and it didn’t blend as good. Plus I had to sit there and push down on it to pulse it. With this blender all I do is hit one button and it goes by itself and stops by itself. Perfect blend every time.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Linman

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: As long as you follow the instructions, you’ll be fine. Don’t overfill it, add the liquid last, and don’t use hot liquids. I love the two different smaller cups in addition to the traditional size, and the included lids are great, too. Super easy to clean and unless you really make a mess like a white person in an infomercial, you probably won’t have to worry about cleaning the base at all.
customer_reviews.author: AMH

customer_reviews.title: Unit broke and started smoking after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months the unit started smoking, we called customer service to get a replacement but the rep refused and told us we needed to replace the blades. The rep would send us the blades but wanted us to pay the shipping. In addition, the machine is extremely noisy. The blender very noisy and broke after 5 months. Very poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P Ward

customer_reviews.title: Blends well may not last long..
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender and use it almost everyday. Unfortunately after so much use I noticed my screw on blender piece has like motor oil or something come out of it. Really bummed out Because the single serve blender piece is all I use, but a little nervous now to use it..
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about 40 days
customer_reviews.text: I used this blender about every day for about 40 days for a morning shake. It was able to grind up spinach and oatmeal pretty well. However by the 40th day, it stopped working and would no longer blend. This was right outside Amazon's 30 day return window so it was pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: c. johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best of all worlds for this smoothie fan!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blender. After my old blender smoked up making a smoothie, I bought this one. It makes the same smoothies in less than a minute (my old one took over five minutes, with lots of pushing fruit down toward the blade). Cleanup up is a LOT easier as well An excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: great performance
customer_reviews.text: I like the sleek look of this product and the ease of use. I have had the nutri bullet now for about a month and use it daily for smoothies and shakes and love it. Would certainly recommend this blender to anyone considering buying one.
customer_reviews.author: MAF

customer_reviews.title: Rubber component burns, gives smoke and bad smell
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this purchase. The rubber component for the blender attachment slowly burns after every use - giving greasy liquid in dark brown color (rubber component is melting), bad smell and smoke. The motor base is too loud, and its rubber component is melting too, contributing to the greasy liquid. The blender insipte of having so much power, doesn't even blend simple substances well. Certainly did not expect this from nutribullet.
customer_reviews.author: Venkat

customer_reviews.title: Best blender I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a ninja. I thought it was a great blender. Boy I was wrong. Nutribullet really blends. Ninja just chops.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive at first, but it works perfectly. I'm incredibly happy with how easy it is to clean and how well it blends. It crushes frozen blueberries for smoothies on just the low setting! The old blender I used would have to be on high to even blend a smoothie. I was happy with the amount of accessories that came with it. Overall this was an amazing purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mad

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this product. I had the original nutribullet and used it forever. This newer model is terrific! They improved some of the flaws in the older version and added some wonderful new features. The combo with the blender and accessories is a great additional option.
customer_reviews.author: Marci M. Krufka

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I've had other blenders but this one beats them all. Currently used for smoothies - definitely puts others to shame with the power and size of the serving cups.
customer_reviews.author: Krazytoo

customer_reviews.title: Strong and fast
customer_reviews.text: My bullet after 8 years, died. No idea what happened . Anyway I was looking to buy the same , but I’m happy I ended up with this one . IT IS GREAT..so strong looooooooove it
customer_reviews.author: Ariella Karim

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This blender is great. I had many other well-known brands but this one is the best so far. I do not know how long it lasts. My review is only on performance.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Really loud and leaking
customer_reviews.text: I bought it March 8th 2020 and use everyday. After one month, Suddenly getting louder and louder then start leaking from Extractor blade. I don’t recommend this blender at all . Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: chisa sakurai

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender/Grinder
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use with Multifunctional buttons. Stays firm on the counter while blending at high speed. Great locking system for safe use. I certainly recommend this product. Love this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: I’m blown away!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned a vitamix, the little ninja and blendtec. This is by far the best blender hands down. It’s just like my vitamix and blendtec. I was skeptical about the extraction but wow I used fresh OJ, a whole carrot, pineapple and spinach and ice... it was sooooooo good and smooth not one grainy piece. This thing is a gem for those on Berger but want the vitamix experience
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade from my NB 900 Series
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from the Nutra bullet 900 series. This has a solid and rugged construction. Powerful motor to blend smoothies with things such as kale and spinach. I also wanted a larger container so I could make smoothies in one batch that would last a couple of days. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rory R

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t properly blend
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. The blender blade doesn’t blend food correctly. Perfect for individual shakes only.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Me

customer_reviews.title: Super, glad I made the upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: I made an upgrade from the nutribullet 1000 to this one and I'm glad I did. I wife is super happy with it. Fast delivery, came at the date it said it would come, so that was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Carrasquillo

customer_reviews.title: truly amazing blender
customer_reviews.text: i think this product was well designed and the maker really sat and thought about the costumers needs and gave everything to us perfectly i think this is the best yet of the nutri bullet brand truly amazing bender
customer_reviews.author: Intrinsic Music Group

customer_reviews.title: Blade has to be replaced too often.
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. We use it many times daily. Unfortunately the blade has to be replaced every 3 months or so due to severe wear (starts leaking, and strains motor (smoke). It appears that Nutribullet doesn't even list this 1200W unit anymore on their web showcase. Most replacement blades sold are inferior generic (which probably will fail after a month of active use). Sorry for this negative review.
customer_reviews.author: M. O.

customer_reviews.title: Useful machine
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly gets the job done and smooth batter!! Wonderfully done my soaked lentils and soaked rice batter for dosa recipe! Awesome job done ! Love my breakfasts every day for any kind / special food! Useful machine!
customer_reviews.author: simple

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Other than leaving more pulp than I care for, I love this machine. It's fairly quiet, and works well. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Eve N Houston

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blender combo primarily for making healthy fruit & vegetable smoothies. Unfortunately it also makes wonderful chocolate malts!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my bullet that had died- didn’t have a large size traditional blender, so upgraded to this.. glad I did! Works great, fits in my cupboard, pitcher height that is- base goes in cupboard separately.. sturdy and does the job of coarse to ultra fine chop & blend
customer_reviews.author: Sheilao55

customer_reviews.title: best blender/juicer ever!
customer_reviews.text: I had the 600 bullet motor before this and i love this. I mainly juice so the extraction button is awesome. It automatically blends to a smooth consistency! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Yale Alfred

customer_reviews.title: As good as our high end blender
customer_reviews.text: We have been devout users of our Vitamix, but this is the second time we’ve had to send it out for repair. (Their repair policy is great). We bought this as a backup and for use while our other one was down. This is makes great green drinks and smoothies, and it’s easier to clean, lighter weight and takes up less counter space. Our Vitamix has become the backup!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jeffrey Barsch

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: After 10 months of working more less ok it got destroyed while i was preparing a soup feom vegetables. I am really disappointed and I wouldn't recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Carmona

customer_reviews.title: A great blender
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting a blender and spent extra for this bad boy. Worth the price if willing to spend. I love it and had the money to get it. I do not regret one bit
customer_reviews.author: Shizuofan

customer_reviews.title: low quality
customer_reviews.text: The product came with a big vase and a small with a different blade. The small dis started to damage the blade after 6 months. The big blender noise is increasingly loud. The overall quality of this product is cheap for the price. Not satisfied with the performance of this product when blending. cheap brands (20US$ or less) will do the same or better.
customer_reviews.author: thetrejo

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I had a nutribullet for a single serving and it worked wonders. Recently I got into Keto diet and can't get enough of my veggie intake using the single-serving blender, so I ordered this one. It came in yesterday and I immediately put it into use. The power is very strong and super easy to clean. I wish the price is a little lower but very functional!
customer_reviews.author: Sof

customer_reviews.title: When you want the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is one amazing blender! Wish we had bought it years ago... Very easy to use and extremely powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great blender but loud!
customer_reviews.text: We love this blender - great power, easy to use, easy to clean, love the extra accessories and it doesn't take up too much counter space. The only downside is that it is pretty loud!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful blender!
customer_reviews.text: We've used a few different sized nutribullets over the years and this is by far the most powerful, full-featured model we've had. This thing would blend hardened steel, if you asked it to! Awese product!
customer_reviews.author: Werner

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED IN THE PERFORMANCE
customer_reviews.text: i didn't think it should take 20 minutes to get a fruit smoothie made. Returned it and bought a Vitamix.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

product_meta.title: NutriBullet ZNBF30500Z Blender Combo 1200 Watt, 1200W, Dark Gray
product_meta.description: Got kitchen ambitions? The NutriBullet combo blender is our One-For-All option: A super-capable, super-flexible blender that makes everything from simple smoothies to savory soups and beyond. Its high-capacity 64-Oz. Pitcher is the ultimate countertop TITAN, while its portable travel Cups keep you nourished on-the-go. Our blades, Cups and pitcher are designed to work together for optimal nutrient extraction, turning ordinary food into Super food.
feature_bullets: NutriBullet blender combo will take your nutrition extraction to the next level with the versatility of both a multi-serving pitcher and a single serve cup.

Three precision speeds, A pulse function and the extract program offer full control at the Press of a button. 1200 watts of power let you make an endless array of smoothies, soups, sauces, nut butters and beyond.
Includes: (1) 1200W motor base, (1) 64 oz blender with lid and vented lid cap, (1) Tamper, (1) 32 oz cup, (1) 24 oz cup, (2) to-go lids, (1) easy-twist Extractor blade, and recipe book
The easy-twist Extractor blade is made of powerful stainless steel and designed with cyclonic action. Our super-durable BPA-free pitcher and cups are made of high-performance plastic.
Hassle-free cleaning - simply place pitcher and cups in the dishwasher and rinse The easy twist Extractor blades with soap and water.
Unit dimensions: 8.07 L x 7.75 W x 16.97 H
This item includes a 1 year Limited warranty.
Note: Refer to user manual before use
Product built to North American & Canadian Electrical standards
